pr_title: BXC-2390 - Links between apps and Header fixes

timeline.message: Fix generation of admin and public links in header to not insert extra slash, and remove unnecessary path calculations
Remove home link from front page, and fix the url used for the home link in the footer
Fix a few other links between applications to avoid double slashes
